thread.title: Re: Dan Rather compares Flynn to Watergate, but is he scandalized by THIS bombshell?
thread.title_full: Re: Dan Rather compares Flynn to Watergate, but is he scandalized by THIS bombshell?

author: jaded
title: Re: Dan Rather compares Flynn to Watergate, but is he scandalized by THIS bombshell?
text:
It’s almost as if scandals took a hiatus while Democrats were in power. Or maybe Dan was just asleep the entire time. @DanRather Ummmm Dan, plenty of others that you ignored. Please, don't be that silly in your thinking. 
— James Hicks (@Jhic709365) February 14, 2017 @DanRather ur kidding?HRC email server, Clinton Foundation, Benghazi! U hack,where have u been for the last 8 years?Only Reps have scandals? 
— Kevin Haussmann (@hausskev) February 14, 2017 @DanRather bigger scandal than Fast and Furious, paying ransom to Iran, using IRS to target political foes? This why we don't trust media! 
We sure as heck don’t trust Dan Rather. The delusion is thick with this one. https://t.co/ObQEnzGtiy 
— Jay W. Richards (@FreemarketJay) February 14, 2017 I feel like Dan Rather is going with this angle for every single Trump story. https://t.co/0oJpJJMfXg 
— Josh Jordan (@NumbersMuncher) February 14, 2017 
Would Dan care to comment on this Flynn-related scandal? SCOOP: The execution of Michael Flynn: How Obama admin loyalists secretly orchestrated his ouster to save Iran deal https://t.co/4XvjPylHHC 
— Adam Kredo (@Kredo0) February 14, 2017 Snr White House NSC official tells me plot against Flynn was targeted & longstanding, 'not series of random events' https://t.co/4XvjPylHHC pic.twitter.com/wO9a0n44qb 
— Adam Kredo (@Kredo0) February 14, 2017 WOW: 'In Dec, Obama NSC pinged favorite reporters, selectively leaking damaging, incomplete info about Flynn' https://t.co/4XvjPylHHC pic.twitter.com/vpuEVOvhqm 
— Adam Kredo (@Kredo0) February 14, 2017 
Speak up, Dan! We can’t hear you!
